body:
**Feature request**
As part of https://github.com/rapidsai/cudf/pull/10769, `s3` support was added to `ParquetDatasetWriter`. This is a request to add other generic cloud provider support such that `gcfs` too is handled.

comments.body: This issue has been labeled `inactive-30d` due to no recent activity in the past 30 days. Please close this issue if no further response or action is needed. Otherwise, please respond with a comment indicating any updates or changes to the original issue and/or confirm this issue still needs to be addressed. This issue will be labeled `inactive-90d` if there is no activity in the next 60 days.

title: [FEA] Additional cloud storage support in `ParquetDatasetWriter`
